title: Specialty Outfit
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Alright, It’s done, Shizuku-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waa….That’s amazing! Kotori-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I was flustered when I tore my important outfit, but it’s just like before! No, it’s even better than before!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe….you noticed? Sorry for doing it on my own<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Absolutely not! You decorated the white part of the cloth with fine lace right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yes. I did it so it doesn’t glow strangely from the light, it’s cotton after all, though you can’t really see it from the audience seat huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>No! Even if the audience can’t see it, details are important! It’s Juliet’s costume, so delicacy is what you want the most! Aah! Kotori-san, thank you--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s okay~. But as thanks, can I ask you for something? I want to go and watch to your play♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Of course you’re invited! With these clothes on, I will do my very best!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
